short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the status of the Skia buildbot in the toolbar.  Click to see more detailed status in a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you quickly monitor the status of the Skia buildbots.

A badge on the icon indicates whether any builds are failing, and you can click through to detailed information about the failing buildbots.

The options page allows you to set the update interval and patterns for which buildbots you want to monitor.
